booksforall.listeners

Class InitializeDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • booksforall.listeners.InitializeDB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    @WebListener
public class InitializeDB
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    A listener that reads the users, reviews, e-books json files and populates the data into a Derby database and also creates random likes,purcheses and readings.
